title: Call bank on Friday
text: I need to call the bank on friday, Dec 3, 2021.

title: Reschedule delivery
text: Need to reschedule the delivery of Christmas presents on Thursday, Dec. 23, 2021.

title: Finish payroll
text: Payroll for the month of November needs to be finished by Friday, November 26, 2021.

title: Check in with clients
text: Check in with clients on Sunday, Dec. 19, 2021.  Make sure they all arrived safetly.

title: Client lunch on Thursday
text: Take clients to lunch on Thursday, Dec. 23, 2021.  For Holiday Party.
